snippet: Mark Sanchez flew to Florida a few weeks ago for a face-to-face meeting with Santonio Holmes. They ate. They spoke. And, according to Sanchez, they laughed.
abstract: Mark Sanchez flew to Florida a few weeks ago for a face-to-face meeting with Santonio Holmes. They ate. They spoke. And, according to Sanchez, they laughed.

headline.main: Jets' Sanchez Says a Meeting With Holmes Cleared the Air
